text:
too.
I won’t go into them now. No hard feelings. All business again. It was worth trying and happy I did. If you change your mind, please let me know.
But be committed. When you say you are, and then go dark and don’t move on your stuff, it just frustrates me as it just proves the point this does not
work.
Anyway, as mentioned, I’m still your husband and wish you the best. I hope you appreciate the thought. It was well intended. Have an amazing day!
Message 1348 of 4024
Thank you for this thoughtful email.
I always have hope we can interact in a calm way. If there is a demonstrated track record and commitment to staying this course that would go a long
way.
Appreciate the partnership.
Adrian is following up with his teachers today in the evaluations.

Subject:Re: Touch Base
Message 1349 of 4024
It’s a catch 22. You see that of course.
So back to, Lisa? And end this idea?
Sent:02/13/2024 at 09:45 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:47 AM)
Subject:Re: Touch Base
Message 1350 of 4024
I’ve reached out to AnnaLisa to understand my restrictions. I do not want to inadvertently make you violate the RO and bear that burden/blame.
Sent:02/13/2024 at 09:49 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:50 AM)
Subject:Re: Touch Base
Message 1351 of 4024
Hey Thanks!
Do what you need to do. But I said multiple times, I’m trying to help you, but I don’t want to put myself in legal jeopardy.
